verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, be the centre
Be my source, be my light
Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, be the centre
Be my hope, be my song
Jesus

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be the fire in my heart
Be the wind in these sails
Be the reason that I live
Jesus, Jesus

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus, be my vision
Be my path, be my guide
Jesus
